definition: worldly wisdom/the ways of the world/to know how to get on in the world
experienced in the ways of the world (idiom); worldly-wise/sophisticated

sentences.english: Does it mean that a sophisticated man has a high EQ?
sentences.chinese: 这是否意味着老于世故的人拥有较高的情商？

sentences.english: Those sophistications forced me to connect things in my life in my mind.
sentences.chinese: 剧中的那些圆滑世故让我联想到现实生活中的事情。

sentences.english: She's a very sophisticated young woman.
sentences.chinese: 她是个老于世故的年轻女子。

sentences.english: He was a man of much worldly wisdom, and in some ways resembled Voltaire.
sentences.chinese: 他精于人情世故，在某些方面酷似伏尔泰。

sentences.english: Parry crossed his arms and adopted a worldly, man-to-man tone.
sentences.chinese: 帕里抱起胳膊，腔调变得坦率而世故起来。

sentences.english: The ordinary reader is endowed with considerable wisdom and knowledge of the way of the world.
sentences.chinese: 那位普通读者有着关于人情世故的丰富智慧和知识。

sentences.english: She tried to cultivate an air of sophistication.
sentences.chinese: 她竭力养成一种老于世故的气派。

sentences.english: The sophisticated school doctor had a sour temper.
sentences.chinese: 那个老于世故的校医脾气很坏。

sentences.english: This is a hotel that is popular with sophisticates.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个世故者喜欢的酒店。

sentences.english: I just do not understand the traditional code of conduct child.
sentences.chinese: 我只是个不懂人情世故的孩子。

sentences.english: He felt people were contemptuous of his lack of sophistication.
sentences.chinese: 他觉得人们看不起他不懂人情世故。

sentences.english: The sights of Paris bowled over the unsophisticated tourists.
sentences.chinese: 巴黎景色让不谙世故的旅游者们大吃一惊。

sentences.english: He's very young and inexperienced, and doesn't know about the ways of the world.
sentences.chinese: 他还很年轻，又缺乏经验，不懂得人情世故。

sentences.english: He was not a young man in mind though he wore the mask of youth.
sentences.chinese: 表面上年轻，他实际已经是一个深于世故的老人。

sentences.english: Can be seen as manipulative. Offloads personal work.
sentences.chinese: 看起来老于世故，卸除个人工作。

sentences.english: Is the best mature, worldly-wise and not sophisticated.
sentences.chinese: 最好的成熟，是深谙世故而不世故。

definition: worldly wisdom/the ways of the world/to know how to get on in the world
affairs of life/things of the world
experienced in the ways of the world (idiom); worldly-wise/sophisticated
open and candid (idiom); not hiding anything/ingenuous
be smooth and slick (in establishing social relations)
